name: Ball Brick Breaker
description:
Ball Break Breaker is a addictive new break breaker game.


Hold to aim, release to shoot all the bricks, and reduce their durability to zero.

Shoot the ball and break and destroy all the bricks. Colorful bricks, fun sound effects and more.

Break more bricks to achieve higher score and relax your brain

Thanks for playing.
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
